** Carnage neared the tree roots where she heard the useless struggle of the 
dying boar, walking a little faster for wanted to end its suffering.
Dropping the sow off just at the base of the tree Carnage hauled herself up 
onto a large root, peering over the side and spotting the boar.
Her jaws snapped down and finished it just as Teltoli landed a few meters 
off and moved towards her, bracing her legs againct the root and hauling the 
boar up and over the large root with her jaws as her head turned towards the 
cat.
Her expression was less then blank, but with such a large catch in her mouth 
she had no room for flexability in her facial movements.
Carnage backed off of the root and set the boar down right beside the sow, 
looking back along the way she had come and wondering if she should go back 
for the piglet again.
It wasn't much trouble and nothing out of her way.
However, she did mannage to stop for a moment to listen to the fuzor's tale 
before wandering off a short distance down the trail and gathering the small 
meal in her front claws, coming back and setting it alongside the two larger 
swine.
Carnage flexed the muscles in her hand before looing towards Teltoli, 
finally resting her weight on her hind legs as she simply looked at her for 
a few moment with her green eyes which told nothing of the meotions of 
within.
This creature standing before her was the same fembot she had called, " 
friend" once upon a time.
The same one who ended up leaving with no explination what so ever, then 
returned and expected everything to be just fine and dandy?
Carnage growled as her eyes narrowed, then turning her head and body away 
from Teltoli and towards her meals.
It was time to take them back to the swamp.
With her jaws she mannaged to swing the boar up onto her back, also using 
her musclebownd teeth to position it right so that it wouldn't fall off. 
Doing the same with the sow but having a more troubled time making it stay 
where she wanted.
Carnage then bent down, very carefully, and snatched up the piglet. Glancing 
towards Teltoli for a moment before throwing the limp sack of pink skin and 
meat towards her. The headless body flopping just before the fuzor.
She growled for a moment as she heard the words of Teltoli before 
straighting off and moving towards the direction she would take to get to 
the swamps which had been her home for so long.
Her voice was bitter.**

" Would you shoot me in the head if you had to too?!"

** Carnage looked towards Teltoli for a second more before moving carefully 
off towards her long time home. Making sure that her prizes didn't fall.
But she suddenly stopped, nearly losing the sow, glaring towards the plains 
that appeared towards the gaps in the huge trees.
There was a nasty looking storm approaching from the north/east, hearing 
very distant thunder.
She sighed for a moment before continuing on her way, angling a little away 
from the storm, knowing that there was a long way to go before she got home.
Though, Carnage did not just shove Teltoli aside.
She had done the wrong thing and she was rightfully pissed off about it, but 
she wouldn't stop the fuzor if she decided to follow her.**
